import React from 'react'; import { userTypeModel } from '../../models/UserTypeFromServer'; import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete'; // ---------------------------------- This Is The 'Vacation' Component ---------------------------------- // export default function VacationComponent (props: any) { return (

{props.vacation.vacationName}

{props.vacation.startDate}

-

{props.vacation.endDate}

{props.vacation.vacationPrice} $

{props.vacation.vacationDescription}
{/* If The Current User Is An Admin, Show Him The Control Buttons */} {userTypeModel === "ADMIN" ?
:
{props.validateVacationIsNotLikedByTheUser(props.vacation) ?
{props.onVacationFollowAttempt(props.vacation)}}>
:
{props.onVacationFollowAttempt(props.vacation)}}>
}
}

{props.vacation.followersCount}

) }
